title: Horrorama - new brush script from Tour De Force
content:
From the "director" of Punkerro Crust and Dusan Script, Horrorama is new try of making decorative fonts for serious and fun use at the same time.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20131016205720im_/http:/typophile.com/files/Horrorama_Poster_Big_Typophile_3534.png)

[Horrorama @ MyFonts](http://web.archive.org/web/20131016205720/http:/new.myfonts.com/foundry/Tour_De_Force/)
author: tourdeforce
